email_body: Thanks. I am waiting to speak to Pauline Kuo to schedule a time and place to meet her this week. Hopefully we can meet Tuesday or Wednesday. I will swing by your office to pick up the documents. Phillip -----Original Message----- From: JacquesTC@aol.com@ENRON Sent: Monday, September 10, 2001 9:54 AM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: Re: Phillip, I sent you a note that the changes have been made and faxed to Kevin. Call me to arrange to pick up the originals or have them delivered where you need them. Thanks, Jacques
